SitePartDef.label: ancient launch site
SitePartDef.description: An abandoned collection of launch pads used to deliver supplies to orbital platforms. It contains working transport pods.

SitePartDef.label: ancient garrison
SitePartDef.description: A long-abandoned military structure. It may still contain valuable items, as well as active security systems. Use caution while exploring these ruins.

SitePartDef.label: ancient chemfuel refinery
SitePartDef.description: An abandoned industrial installation containing large quantities of chemfuel. It may also contain active security systems.

SitePartDef.label: ancient warehouse
SitePartDef.description: An abandoned warehouse. It still contains valuables. It may also contain active security systems.

SitePartDef.label: infested settlement
SitePartDef.description: A once-prosperous settlement that's succumb to an insect infestation. It may still contain valuable resources.
